abilities.name: Cosmic Horror
abilities.rule: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Might From Beyond
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[DEVASTATING WOUNDS]** ability.

abilities.name: Psychic Familiar
abilities.rule:
Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use its psychic familiar. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the range of its Cosmic Horror ability.

***Designer’s Note:** Place a Psychic Familiar token next to the model, removing it once this ability has been used.*

unit_composition:
